trans-unit.source: AWS Global DynamoDB Tables is an odd case currently. The way this package works -
trans-unit.target: AWS全局DynamoDB表是目前的一个奇葩案例。这个包的工作方式--

trans-unit.source: Creates a DynamoDB table in a separate stack in each DynamoDBGlobalStackProps.region specified
trans-unit.target: 在指定的每个 DynamoDBGlobalStackProps.region 中的单独堆栈中创建DynamoDB表。

trans-unit.source: Deploys a CFN Custom Resource to your stack's specified region that calls a lambda that runs the aws cli which calls createGlobalTable()
trans-unit.target: 将CFN自定义资源部署到堆栈的指定区域，该区域调用运行lawsda的lambda，该lambda运行aws cli，后者调用 createGlobalTable()

trans-unit.source: Global Tables builds upon DynamoDB’s global footprint to provide you with a fully managed, multi-region, and multi-master database that provides fast, local, read and write performance for massively scaled, global applications. Global Tables replicates your Amazon DynamoDB tables automatically across your choice of AWS regions.
trans-unit.target: Global Tables建立在DynamoDB的全球足迹的基础上，可为您提供完全托管的，多区域和多主数据库，可为大规模的全球应用程序提供快速，本地，读写性能。全局表会在您选择的AWS区域之间自动复制Amazon DynamoDB表。

trans-unit.source: GlobalTable() will set dynamoProps.stream to be NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES since this is a required attribute for AWS Global DynamoDB tables to work. The package will throw an error if any other stream specification is set in DynamoDBGlobalStackProps.
trans-unit.target: GlobalTable（）会将 dynamoProps.stream 设置为 NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES ,因为这是AWS Global DynamoDB表起作用的必需属性。如果在 DynamoDBGlobalStackProps 中设置了任何其他 stream 规范，则该包将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Here is a minimal deployable Global DynamoDB tables definition:
trans-unit.target: 这里是一个最小的可部署的Global DynamoDB表定义。

trans-unit.source: NOTICE: This module has been deprecated in favor of @aws-cdk/aws-dynamodb.Table.replicationRegions
trans-unit.target: 注意：不建议使用此模块，而推荐使用 @aws-cdk/aws-dynamodb.Table.replicationRegions

trans-unit.source: This API may emit warnings. Backward compatibility is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 这个API可能会发出警告。不保证向后的兼容性。
